category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 7 (Dismissal of members)
contents: Article 7 (Dismissal of a member) The chairman may dismiss a member if he or she falls under any of the following items. However, in cases falling under subparagraphs 5 and 6, it must be dismissed. Revised on January 31, 2019. 1. When a member declares that it is difficult for him or her to perform his/her duties. 2. When there is a case of misconduct related to his/her duties. 3. When the obligations under Article 11-2 are not complied with. Newly established 2019. 1. 31. 4. When it is deemed unsuitable to be a member due to neglect of duty, loss of dignity, illness, or other reasons. 5. When it does not evade despite falling under Article 11. 6. A letter of resignation at the request of the member. If you submit
